In this study, A. verlotiorum, L. dentata and R. chalepensis EOs, showing anti-mosquito properties similar or higher than DEET, appear as viable alternative to synthetic repellents. Unlike DEET, EOs based products may be well accepted by the public due to the increasing consumer demand for effective and safe, natural products. More significantly, considering the sensory quality parameters of EOs, the possibility of theirÂ use can be expanded by incorporating EOs in sprays, creams, lotions and aerosols based anti-mosquito formulations. The good protection time currently observed can be further increased by polymer encapsulation
53 and by other compound like vanillin
54 or by the combined action of optimized EOs mixtures, due to the synergistic co-repellent effect of EOs chemical constituents
